text: Key Terrain - Central Bridge over Põrnujõgi
justification: Chokepoint enabling control of movement between both riverbanks. Critical for maneuver, supply, and defense in depth.

text: Key Terrain - Forested high ground WNW near Reinumurru
justification: Elevated, forested position overlooking western and central mobility corridors.

text: Observation Point - Open ridge NE of Venekuusiku
justification: Dominates NE sector with line of sight over Suurjõe–Kulimaa road and flanking terrain.

text: Cover and Concealment - Forest south of Jõesuu road
Cover and Concealment - Patch north of Suurjõe–Kulimaa
Avenue of Approach - North to Center via 19242
Avenue of Approach - W to E (Reinumurru to Jõesuu)
Avenue of Approach - SE corridor via Vihtra
